title: Expert Competency Enhancement Education Based on Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Team-based learning environment incorporating high-fidelity simulation (HFS) and reflective debriefing in a smartphone-centric limited-technology setting

learning_goals: Learners can perform clinical judgments in response to real-time patient status changes in a simulation environment with over 80% accuracy.
Participants can record and improve team communication and collaboration strategies at least three times through reflective debriefing.
Based on simulation experiences, learners can develop core nursing intervention plans applicable to real clinical situations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
